<[[https://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/dubai]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Do you want to gain or retain market leadership in the new era of digital disruption? Did you know that superior digital experiences can drive customer acquisition and retention? Do you want a better understanding of how you can accelerate the pace of business innovation to stay ahead of the competition?
Join us to learn how digital disruption is affecting businesses, why digital disruptors are so successful, and what innovative technology capabilities you need to become a modern software company.
“With Pivotal we have minimized our innovation cycles and can now respond to changing market demands faster than ever before, both of which allowed us to develop a profound software culture in our transformational journey into a digital company.” —Christoph Hartung, Head of Connected Cars, at Mercedes-Benz
DATE : 1 November 2016 TIME : 8h30 to 15h00 LOCATION: The St. Regis Dubai <[[http://www.stregisdubai.com/]]>, Al Habtoor City, Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai, UAE
Full Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/dubai]]>
Register now as space is limited. This is an exclusive event.
REGISTER HERE <[[https://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/dubai]]>
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
